entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
